title: CI: Source-Test-Scan-Deployable-gitops
description: This blueprint consists of templates and CI supply chain to create a production scenario. Please note: it produces the deployable to run on Cloud Native Runtime. If you do not want that please modify the config-writer.

title: CD: Simple GitOps+Kapp based deployment.
description: This blueprint consists of templates and CD delivery for a simple deployment scenario
